title: Fishing Trip
blurb: Escape from the hum and drum of busy day to day society to northern Saskatchewan. Relax on the lake in a state of the art aluminum fishing boat.A fully modern lodge on Otter Lake, Enjoy many amenities including a licensed restaurant, luxury cabins, conference facilities, pontoon and fishing boat rentals and fly-outs for anglers. Experience excellent walleye, northern pike and perch fishing. Guiding service is available for anglers and bear and moose hunters.
details: One week duration, float plane ride in covered. Cabins come in one or two bedroom. Fishing gear, bait and boat provided. Fish fileting services available on site extra.
